label: 和事
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: [Kabuki acting style.]  Tender" business, or the style of the great lover, [as opposed to] aragoto (rough business) style [which was developed] to enact the great feats of strength of rash heroes (p. 753). [歌舞伎、荒事]"
